name: Table
description: Display tabular data with support for responsive stacking, sticky headers and footers, row headers, and merged cells.

allowStacking.description: Whether to adapt the layout by stacking columns when the viewport or container is narrow

caption.description: Caption object, or content and attributes corresponding to a Caption object

context.description: The kebab-case or BEM name of the parent component or variant if contextually relevant

sticky.description: Make the header "sticky" when the table is large enough to scroll vertically, or make the first column "sticky" when the table is large enough to scroll horizontally; designed for use with <thead> or the first cells all being <th scope="row"> elements

tagName.description: The HTML tag to use for this component

testId.description: Optionally add a data-testid attribute for automated tests

data.description: Either an array of TableCell and/or TableHeaderCell objects or an array of associative arrays corresponding to TableCell or TableHeaderCell fields
